title: Makkayala Makkayala Lyrics Naan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Krishan Maheson, Mark, Shakthi Shree
Song: Makkayala Makkayala 
Lyrics: Priyan
Movie: Naan
Music : Vijay Antony
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
You the hot type, I'm the rock type
you that fly type,I'm that right type ..Ok
When the bass drops, you know wat to do
when the beat drops, you know wat to do
holla holla baby holla at this thug
holla holla baby holla at this thing

Makkayala Makkayala kaaya maahuva
Makkayala Makkayala kaaya maahuva
Makkayala Makkayala kaaya maahuva
yela yela yela

Ilamaiku eppozhuthum thayakam illai
Thadaiyethum kangalukku therivathillai
Engalukku kaalgal indru tharaiyil
illai ..illai ..illai...illai.

Thanimayile koocham illai,
Thayangi ninral motcham illai
Kaatrukendrum baaram illai,
ellaigal meedhu thappillai
(Makkayala  ...)

Iravinil thookam, kidayaadhe
Pagal varai aatam, mudiyaadhey
color color kanavugal kuraiyaadhe
kuraiyaadhe..aii

Netraya pozhuthu kadanthaache
Naalaya pozhuthu kanavaache
Indraya pozhuthu nam vasamache..
vasamaache..

Nanbar kootam, ondraaga sernthaal
pongum sandhosam..m..hmmm...
Kodi kodi aasaigal vandhu
Kadhavai thaatum.. aii..aii oh..
(Makkayala ..)

[rap - i tried my best guys]
..
you got to wait in party
I got to tell you whats up
i got top type of HUSTLER'S
WANT TO STEP INTO THIS CLUB.

It doesn't your not kids...
actually glow WiFi ,,,
We got move yo dolls pills babe..
so yo high

you know
you got me say am really
bad like michael jackson
decide in ..propel
like in action

haul like a guys thing
haul like a volture
fly like a superman
fly on departure

Natpuku nerangal theiriyaathe
Pechugal thodarndhal mudiyaadhe
Idaiveli ingae kidayaadhe ..kidayaadhe

Manadhukul edhayum adaikaathe
Vaaipugal marupadi kidaikathe
Irupathu oru life..marakathe..marakathe...

Nanban thozhil saaidhaale podhum
Kavalaigal theerum..oh
Inbam thunbam nerkindra podhum
Natpu thaangum..
aei aei..oh...
 (Makkayala ..)

Ilamaiku eppozhuthum thayakam illai ...
Thanimayile koocham illai ..
(Makkayala  ...)

Makkayala Makkayala kaaya maahuva

Teenage never hesitates -they
don’t mind any hinder in their way
our legs are not in the floor now
no .. no.. no. . no..

no shyness while alone
no use in standing alone
nothing is burden for air , never
no wrong in having border line
(Makkayala  ...)

no sleep in nights
non stop fun till dawn
no diminish in our colorful dreams
never..

yesterday’s time was gone
tomorrow’s time is a dream
today’s time is our’s..
our’s

non stop joy if friends group
join together..mmmmm
crore’s of desires will
knock the door… yei yei..
(Makkayala ..)

[rap - i tried my best guys]
..
you got to wait in party
I got to tell you whats up
i got top type of HUSTLER'S
WANT TO STEP INTO THIS CLUB..

It doesn't your not kids...
actually glow WiFi ,,,
We got move yo dolls pills babe..
so yo high

you know
you got me say am really
bad like michael jackson
decide in ..propel
like in action

haul like a guys thing
haul like a volture
fly like a superman
fly on departure

no time concerns for friendship
non stop chatting once started
no distance here.. no .no

don’t hide anything within you
you don’t get another chance
its only one life.. don’t forgot .

lying on friends shoulder will
heal all problems .. oh..
on bad and good times
friendship can handle all problems.
yei yei.. oh
(Makkayala ..)

Teenage never hesitates..
no shyness while alone ..
